tree.description:
The tree the requested subject set expands to.
The requested subject set is the subject of the root.

This field can be nil in some circumstances.

v1alpha1ExpandResponse.description: The response for an ExpandService.Expand rpc.

v1alpha1NodeType.description:
- NODE_TYPE_UNION: This node expands to a union of all children.
 - NODE_TYPE_INTERSECTION: This node expands to an intersection of the children.
 - NODE_TYPE_LEAF: This node is a leaf and contains no children.
Its subject is a `SubjectID` unless `max_depth` was reached.

id.description: A concrete id of the subject.

set.description:
A subject set that expands to more Subjects
(used for inheritance).

v1alpha1Subject.description:
Subject is either a concrete subject id or
a subject set expanding to more Subjects.

namespace.description:
The namespace of the object and relation
referenced in this subject set.

object.description: The object selected by the subjects.

relation.description: The relation to the object by the subjects.

v1alpha1SubjectSet.description:
SubjectSet refers to all subjects which have
the same `relation` to an `object`.
It is also used for inheritance.

children.description:
The children of this node.

This is unset if `node_type` is `NODE_TYPE_LEAF`.
